name: X-URL-Uploader
description: Telegram bot to upload HTTP link to telegram server.

BOT_TOKEN.description: Your bot token, as a string.

AUTH_USERS.description: Telegram ID of authorized users. left it empty to make it public.

DEF_THUMB_NAIL_VID_S.description: Default thumbnail to be used in the videos. Incase yt-dlp is unable to find a thumbnail.

CHUNK_SIZE.description: Chunk size that should be used with requests

HTTP_PROXY.description: Proxy for accessing yt-dlp in GeoRestricted Areas. Get your own proxy from https://github.com/rg3/youtube-dl/issues/1091#issuecomment-230163061
